channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge Pothole near Sudeley Castle, 15th September
item.description:
Near the entrance to Sudeley Castle and Gardens, on the side of the road - headed into Winchcombe Town Centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sudeley, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constantly running water, 15th September
item.description:
Water has been running along this section of the Road throughout this very dry summer. It is not ground water runoff as local springs were dry. Poss leak from 10 inch ST water main. Very dangerous during icy weather, needs resolving before another winter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 15th September
item.description:
Email received 14/09/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that the pavement at the location is collapsing into the development site and needs urgently making safe/repairing.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: This drain on the junction with the no-through-road in Whittington has blocked. We have dug out some material but it is too deep for us to clear and is causing a problem for the heavy traffic flow caused by the closure of the London Road in Charlton Kings., 15th September
item.description:
By 12, Whittington, GL54 4HB
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
